categories: Category:Years in the Great Peace of the Republic era

nodes.text: The following events took place in 365 BBY.
By this year, Hettitite and its population of near-Humans were threatened by a supernova.
In 365 BBY, near-Humans from Hettitite colonized Sernpidal to escape a supernova.

Over time, the population of Sernpidal grew to eight million, enough to make it the most populous planet in the Dalonbian sector. This made it a target for the Yuuzhan Vong as they began their invasion of the galaxy.
